description:
'''Sylvie Vartan''' ({{IPA|fr|silvi vaʁtɑ̃|lang}}; born '''Sylvie Georges Vartanian'''{{efn|{{langx|bg|Силви Жорж Вартанян}}; {{langx|hy|Սիլվի Ժորժ Վարդանյան}}.}} on 15 August 1944) is a [[Bulgarians in France|Bulgarian]]-French singer and actress. She is known as one of the most productive and tough-sounding [[yé-yé]] artists. Her performances often featured elaborate show-dance choreography, and she made many appearances on French and Italian TV.

Yearly shows with then-husband [[Johnny Hallyday]] attracted full houses at the [[Paris Olympia|Olympia]] and the [[Palais des congrès de Paris]] throughout the 1960s and mid-1970s. In 2004, after a break in performances, she began recording and giving concerts of jazz ballads in [[francophone]] countries.
